main event: A bright yellow-white object was sighted near Columbus, Ohio on a clear moonlit night in July 1948, moving at a terrific speed.
interesting points: The object was observed for two to three seconds,The sighting occurred at an altitude of 3000 feet,The sight was reported by civilians,The object was described as moving in a horizontal line,The investigator noted the inconsistency of the moon's visibility with the observation time.
